title: VISIBLE LIGHT PHOTOCATALYSIS BY A TITANIA TRANSITION METAL COMPLEX
Photocatalytic Synthesis of Chemicals

items.abstract: Modification of copper iodide with [Cu(SCN)2(phen)2] leads to its photosensitization due to the metal to metal (CuI → CuII) charge transfer transition. The CuII-modified CuI shows an enhanced visible light induced photoactivity.
title: Photosensitization of CuI – the role of visible light induced CuI → CuII transition in photocatalytic degradation of organic pollutants and inactivation of microorganisms
